fields.description:
Description:
While testing KS 172 on iOS 5, Base UI>Window NavBar, I tapped "set bar image" and nothing appear to have happened. After a short investigation it was apparent that the button was working, but the image was appearing behind the navbar. 

Steps to Reproduce:
1) Install KS with SDK 1.7.2 onto iOS 5 device
2) Navigate to Base UI>Window NavBar
3) Press "set bar image"

to see the bar image:
1) Relaunch test 
2) Press "title prompt" button
3) Press "set bar image"
4) Press "title prompt" button again

Results:
No navbar image appears.

Expected results:
Navbar image changes to genuine simulated wood grain

Note:
Does not occur with iOS 4.3x
OCCURS with SDK 1.8.0.v20110922105247
fields.summary: Kitchensink: iOS 5: Base UI>Window NavBar, " set bar image" does not appear as expected
fields.environment: Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535, SDK 1.7.2 GA, SDK 1.8.0.v20110922105247, iPhone 4 AT&T (iOS 5.0).

comments.body: This is a dupe of TIMOB 5047, and the fix for TIMOB 5047 also fixes this.
